# VS Code Restore Folder Extension

This extension allows users to restore deleted files and folders from VS Code's local history.

## Project Structure
- TypeScript-based VS Code extension
- Main functionality in `src/extension.ts`
- Commands for listing and restoring deleted items
- Integration with VS Code's local history API

## Key Features
- List deleted files/folders from local history
- Multi-select capability for restoration
- Recursive restoration of folder structures
- Most recent version recovery

## Development Guidelines
- Follow VS Code extension best practices
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Implement proper error handling
- Provide user feedback during operations
